item.title: Tekken 8 Season 3 DLC characters announced
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

Kunimitsu, Bob, Roger Jr., and an unknown character.

Bandai Namco has announced Tekken 8 Season 3, which will consist of four new playable characters and one new stage.

The full lineup of announced downloadable content characters / content is as follows:

  • Late Spring – Kunimitsu
  • Summer – Bob
  • Fall – Roger Jr.
  • Winter – Unannounced Character / Stage
  • Available upon purchase of Season 3 Pass – “Aurora Outfit Pack”

The following updates are also planned:

  • February 9 / 10
    • Season 3 Pass
    • 2nd Anniversary Campaign
  • March 16 / 17
    • Refined Balance
    • Rank Reset
    • …and more!

Tekken 8 is available now for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam.

Watch the Season 3 reveal trailer below.

Season 3 Trailer
